content.description: 8 bolt (one fixed pin) face up the main buttress (Butterbags Buttress). Located on the right side of the hillside. Excellent. This is the poor man's Loose Lady, but better protected.
content.location: On the Butterbags Buttress Area, between Cottonwood and I-10.

content.description: 3 bolts to thin crack (2 fp) , Located left of Babaloos. Face climb at the start, then up a thin splitter crack, which is too thin to jam at first, so you face climb up it past 2 fixed pins until you can finally fit your fingers in the crack, which is followed to the top. Another excellent and challenging climb.
content.protection: Bolts, fixed pins, and small to med gear for the top crack section. Bolted anchor on top (can be used for Babaloos too..)..
content.location: Located in the Butterbags Area between Cottonwood and I-10.

content.protection: Quick draws only.  Bolted anchor on top.
content.location: Arete left of the Butterbags Buttress near Cottonwood.
